content: VCU was in a position to win both games by a single basket. Saying “St. Bonaventure should have won because it was better at basketball for 39:59.6” is misleading. VCU had the lead for the vast majority of the game (starting around 2 minutes in, until 1 minute left in the game). VCU’s opponents lost because they were equally matched, and but made critical mistakes. Not making dumb mistakes is part of being the better team.
